letters.description: Collect comprehensive client history: symptoms, medical background, family history, lifestyle, diet, and stress levels.
Interpret thyroid lab results (TSH, T4, T3, antibodies) and identify patterns, deficiencies, or imbalances. Consider functional testing for deeper insights.
Develop a personalized holistic plan: nutrition, supplements, lifestyle modifications (stress reduction, sleep hygiene, exercise), and potential referrals.
Provide ongoing support, education, and encouragement. Monitor symptom changes and lab results, adjusting the plan as needed.
Empower the client with long-term strategies for thyroid health maintenance, relapse prevention, and overall well-being.
